title: Executive, Data Analyst
bullets: Hardened the agency's Power BI estate with MFA and role-based access; 160+ officers now consume governed dashboards covering 70% of CRS firms.
Automated FormSG survey dispatch and QA with Postman + UiPath, trimming manual processing time by roughly 30% per survey cycle.
Standardized data-cleansing playbooks that feed cross-agency CAW and SkillsFuture taskforces with audit-ready datasets.

title: UAT Tester
bullets: Authored 40 end-to-end test scripts for new CAPI releases and surfaced 95 defects prior to production cutover.
Built UiPath helpers that shortened regression runs by about 40% while keeping evidence collection traceable.
Aligned acceptance gates with survey ops to ensure field teams received reliable tooling on day one.

title: Radar Operator Officer
bullets: Monitored a 25 nautical mile maritime zone, escalating an average of 12 actionable incidents per month for interception.
Maintained radar readiness through preventive maintenance and shift SOPs, keeping systems available for 24/7 operations.
Safeguarded Singapore Territorial Waters as part of a port ecosystem handling ~140,000 vessel movements yearly, supporting the economy’s tax-friendly maritime hub and Tuas Mega Port ambitions.

title: Information Technology Officer
bullets: Facilitated 15 automation clinics and translated needs into UiPath workflows, saving an estimated 120 staff hours per quarter.
Awarded testimonial for dependable delivery and stakeholder support.

title: Software Engineer
bullets: Built UiPath automations processing 5,000+ SG Work Pass records per run and packaged video training for non-IT teams.
Managed licensing, UAT, and post-implementation support while scripting data-handling automations for a blockchain pilot.
Recognized with a service testimonial for cross-agency support.

title: Desktop Support Engineer
bullets: Resolved 200+ onsite support requests with a 96% satisfaction rating and maintained inventory accuracy for client hardware.
Supported network troubleshooting and end-user enablement during infrastructure changes.
